text: Hello, can `occursin` or `contains` search for whether a string contains multiple substrings ( `&&` )?  If so, what's the syntax?

elements.text: search for whether a string contains multiple substrings (

text: Can we cross post this publicly to <https://discourse.julialang.org|Discourse> for further visibility? React with :bridge: on the message above to approve. <https://github.com/JuliaCommunity/SlackBridge/blob/main/README.md#faq|More info here>

you can match regular expressions:
```julia> occursin(r"hello.*world", "foo hello bar world qux")
true```

elements.text:
julia> occursin(r"hello.*world", "foo hello bar world qux")
true
